2019 - 	GREENCORE Plc., Chesterfield, U.K.
Sustainability Advisor (Waste and Food Surplus)
Liaised with waste service providers to negotiate various service level agreements.
Audited waste service providers to secure compliance with EA and BRC.
Performed a supply chain and back of store food waste analysis to achieve UN sustainability goal 12.3 of halving food waste.
Developed waste and food surplus procedures and policies to ensure consistency across Krissy Polo-Tolley
krissy.polotolley@gmail.com +44 (0) 7721 965 262
5 Garton Mill Drive, Matlock, DE4 5PT
EDUCATION
2017 - 2018 	Keele University
MSc Environmental Sustainability and Green Technology ǀ Distinction
2006 - 2012 	Universidad Nacional Agraria La Molina, Lima, Peru
BSc Environmental Engineering l 2:1 equivalent
BUSINESS EXPERIENCE
2019 - 	GREENCORE Plc., Chesterfield, U.K.
Sustainability Advisor (Waste and Food Surplus)
Liaised with waste service providers to negotiate various service level agreements.
Audited waste service providers to secure compliance with EA and BRC.
Performed a supply chain and back of store food waste analysis to achieve UN sustainability goal 12.3 of halving food waste.
Developed waste and food surplus procedures and policies to ensure consistency across all 16 factories in England. Provided training on waste management to 100+ colleagues.
2013 – 2017	EXXONMOBIL PERU S.R.L., Lima, Peru
SH&E Coordinator
Led Zero Net Waste Programme, undertaking a complete operations and supply chain analysis, increasing recycling by 60% over a 4-year period.
Achieved zero non-conformities for internal and external audits during environmental and safety management audits based on ISO 14001& OHSA 18001. Also performed audits on waste contractors.
Collaborated with other departments to reduce fuel and energy consumption by approx. 4%.
Developed risk matrix, supervised high-risk activities and trained 1500+ personnel in Loss Prevention Systems tools for personal safety, achieving zero loss time injuries and no environmental accidents.
Liaised with third parties-stakeholders to fully implement new regulation on soil quality standards and ensured legal compliance.
Managed conflict by ensuring interest of all parties were represented during Steering Safety and Occupational Health monthly committee.
2012 - 2013 	SCHLUMBERGER WATER SERVICES S.A., Lima, Peru
Environmental Assistant
Prepared baseline, social participation and closure plans for various copper and led mining projects approved by Ministry of Energy and Mines.
2012 - 2013	VOLCAN MINING COMPANY S.A., Pasco, Peru
Environmental Intern (Summer internship)
Performed water monitoring and reporting to secure compliance with government guidelines.
Updated environment and waste management plan.
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
Organised food waste workshops to promote food waste minimisation and food safety practices among residents of Newcastle Under-Lyme and Keele University in partnership with Sainsburys´ Waste Less Save More Campaign.
Conducted market research for Just Weighed start-up company as part of Keele Research and Innovation Support Programme (KRISP).
ISO 9001, 14001 & OSHA 18001 specialisation
Project management specialisation
UK Environmental law course
Grad IEMA membership working towards Practitioner.
Languages: fluent English; native Spanish.
Full UK driving licence.

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
